Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section with a number of small white inclusions, the interior is partly covered with grey-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of three lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393777) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393777)
